text.headline: Bachelor's Degree
text.text: This was the time I started my studies in Mathematics at Cadiz University. A five years journey to become mathematician had commenced.

text.headline: My Introduction to Data Science
text.text: Once I gained some experience in Applied Maths I started to feel curious about Data Analysis and Data Science. Therefore, in parallel with my bachelor, I decided to start a training in that field based in Python and R.

text.headline: Erasmus
text.text: I decided to go abroad for my last year of studies. Definitely Cork was the perfect place, there I improved my English, met amazing teachers to boost my career and, of course, I got a lot of Erasmus fun.

text.headline: Master in Data Science and Big Data
text.text: Back in Spain after the Irish experience and already with the Bachelor's diploma in my pocket, I decided that Data was my thing. So, I moved to Madrid to start my Master's Studies in Data Science and Big Data at Afi Escuela de Finanzas.

text.headline: Future Space Internship
text.text: At the same time I was starting my Master's studies I started as well an intership at Future Space so I could apply the knowledge and start my career getting involved in Data Science projects.

text.headline: Future Space Data Scientist
text.text: Once I finished my Master's Studies, also my internship came to it's end. The company was happy with my work there, so they offered me a position as Data Scientist.

text.headline: UCA Talks
text.text: Some people at my former university were aware that my Master's thesis was based in a Data Science project about hiring processes. They felt interested so they contacted me to give an annual talk about AI in Human Resources in two of their Masters.

text.headline: Coursera Deep Learning Training
text.text: In order to continue boosting my career in the Data Science world, I got a training in Deep Learning, given by Andrew Ng.

text.headline: Project in Paris
text.text: After two years performing as Data Scientist in Future Space and living in Madrid, the company offered me to work in an international project which implies moving to Paris, France.

text.headline: Promotion
text.text: The experience gained during the last 3 years with the company, allowed me to get a promotion to the position of Senior Data Scientist
